TableRow.summary: TableRow structure indicates a row in Table class

remarks.para: It contains string aarray which stores column data of a row

data.summary: Each string in this data array is used to store a column data of a single row. Length of data array is same as number of columns in table. columns number starts from 0.

Table.summary: Table class is a data structure which reprensents a table. It contains rows and columns and also table header.

TableConstructor.sumarry: It takes in TableRow as Parameter which is table header section of table class.

ColumnNames.summary: It is Table header represented by type TableRow
